response.overview: Cherry, a rich class boy and Surya, a poor class boy are friends. Cherry likes smart phone very much, and he is addicted to phone. After the friendship with Surya, Cherry makes Surya also get addicted to phone. Initially Surya doesnâ€™t like phone, but he wants to know few things, after he finds phone in some of the kids hands, and after listening to their answers for his queries.
response.title: Sensitive
